name: All Saints - St. Patrick’s - Firecracker
additionalNotes: All Saints is brought to us by Micky Pegg - former Davidoff Sales Rep and CAO Vice President of Sales - and his business partners. They teamed up with Rocky Patel to bring their vision to life, and the vitola names represent someone special along the way in their journey. Those cigar runs turned into a job as a retailer, then a sales rep for Davidoff, then VP of sales for CAO, and culminated in him starting his own brand: All Saints. He has been involved in premium cigars for over 20 years and is now bringing us the fruits of his labor, the All Saints Dedication.
